alert.note: Alert for Grady; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 4:18PM CDT until May 12 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Grady County in central Oklahoma... West central McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 417 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Alex, moving northeast at 20 mph. Additional storms are located near Rush Springs as well as near Blanchard. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Blanchard, Rush Springs, Dibble, Washington, Cole, Alex, Bridge Creek, Bradley, Agawam, Middleberg, Tabler, Criner, Ninnekah, and Acme. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
